mapper.sql: log.ID, log.KZID, log.OPERAID, log.OPERANAME, log.MEMO, log.OPERATIME, log.LOGTYPE, log.COMPANYID
mapper.select: SELECT log.OPERAID, log.OPERANAME, sf.HEADIMG, log.MEMO, log.OPERATIME, log.LOGTYPE FROM ${logTabName} log LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff sf ON log.OPERAID = sf.ID AND sf.COMPANYID = #{companyId} WHERE log.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND log.KZID = #{kzId} AND log.LOGTYPE = #{logType} ORDER BY log.OPERATIME DESC, log.ID DESC
